name: Air Fryer French Toast
author: Yoly
summary: An easy recipe that is simple and tasty. Whichever flavor you make, this French toast is crispy on the outside and tender on the inside.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon confectioners' sugar, or to taste
directions: Mix eggs, milk, butter, vanilla extract, and cinnamon together in a bowl
Line an air fryer basket with parchment paper and spray with nonstick cooking spray
Dip each slice of bread into the milk mixture and place in the basket
Make sure they are not touching; work in batches if necessary
Preheat the air fryer to 370 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Add basket and air fry   for 4 to 6 minutes; flip and cook for 2 to 3 minutes more
